articles.title: TikTok is making users give their iPhone passwords for unclear reasons - New York Post
articles.description: “TikTok itself doesn’t explicitly state the exact cause,” according to an article from industry expert publication Dataconomy.
articles.content:
TikTok users are now frightened and confused as to why the viral video app is supposedly demanding they input their iPhone password to view content.
